AboutView.title: Project information
AboutView.info_text: For the moment, this website is my web CV. If the need be, I'll be expanding it :)

technologies_text.description: The Composition API in Vue 3.0 is a new way to define components in Vue applications, introducing a more flexible and modular approach compared to the traditional options API. It allows for easier state management, logic handling, and code reuse across components.

Vuetify is a popular UI component library based on Vue.js that provides a wide range of pre-built components adhering to Material Design principles. It enables quick development of modern and responsive user interfaces.

Vue Router is the official routing library for Vue.js, allowing developers to create multi-page applications by managing routes and components within the application. It supports dynamic page loading, URL parameters, and more.
